step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together in this first step.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you lift.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Excellent hold! You maintained good posture and elbow position.
Good return to the starting position. Ensure your wrists stay aligned as you bring your hands down.
Second rep starting well. Continue to keep your elbows relatively close as you bring your hands up.
You're lifting your hands toward your forehead effectively. Focus on maintaining that elbow proximity.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head again. Remember to keep your head steady.
Good hold. You're maintaining good form, especially with your shoulder and elbow alignment.
Excellent return to the start. You successfully completed the exercise with good control.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Continue to focus on maintaining an upright head position throughout the movement.
